ygData.subject: Re: Re: 16th Pet and 20pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Same thing with the necromancers in Befallen, although this was bunk quite some time ago =) Giltaagin ... tolerated
ygData.messageBody:
Same thing with the necromancers in Befallen, although this was bunk quite
some time ago =)

Giltaagin

At 12:14 PM 7/16/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>> I thought killing the undead at Lake Rathe would cause some horrible
>faction
>> change and get you banished from the guild or something? I'm a Dark Elf,
>maybe
>> it only applies to DE's? Can someone confirm or debunk this? Thanks.
>
>It's bunk :) the only faction hit you take is with UnrestInhabitants.
>
>Also a common myth (which I was a victim of until recently) is that killing
>the Darkelves in Mistmoore would cause you to lose faction with Neriak.
>more bunk.
>
>
